TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_ucya, title = ucya, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/ucya} }

S.FORM: uciya u nananuman nu hulam, manamuh ninac tu mahiniay a nanum, pacebusen ku akutiay a nanum tu uciya. sanitu taengtu minanum.
ociya o nananoman no holam, manamoh ninac to mahiniay a nanom, pacebosen ko akotiay a nanom to ociya. sanito taengto minanom.
